name: Alienapocalypse (Macbarette, quafran, gimleesan, Jupiton)
description:
.Gameplay 

In the game you have to play the raptor an the volcano, the volcano use projectile to destroy obstacle and help the raptor 

Raptor:

Use WASD to move and SPACE to jump 

Volcano:

Left mouse click where you want the volcano to shoot 

(beware the shoot follow the scrolling)
